channel.title: Error in the Horizon Walker Ranger Subclass
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Error in the Horizon Walker Ranger Subclass" - Misses Extra Attack

item.title: Error in the Horizon Walker Ranger Subclass
item.content:encoded: This subclass doesn’t get an Extra Attack at 5th level, which only works for the original Ranger. The 11th ability also doesn’t make sense without Extra Attack.
